title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.

Observed Behavior: When trying to select an item in the library outline view of the application, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node instead of allowing the selection of the desired item.

Expected Behavior: The expected behavior is that the user is able to select any item in the library outline view without the focus jumping to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the application
2. Navigate to the library outline view
3. Attempt to select an item in the outline view
4. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of allowing the selection of the desired item
